Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1 was discussed as it is expected to be completed by the end of Q3 this year, which includes Beacon Chain launch on mainnet.


Phase 2 development has started with a focus on shard chains and execution environments for shards. The team aims to have a working prototype in about six months' time.


The CL/EL teams are collaborating closely as they need each other's input before proceeding further.
